mods.note: Each cover imprinted: Nelson A. Rockefeller
mods.abstract: The Commission on Intergovernmental Relations: a report to the President;Civil defense and urban vulnerablity; Federal aid to agriculture; Federal responsibility in the field of education; Natural resources and conservation; Federal aid to airports; Federal aid to highways; Federal aid to public health; Unemployment compensation and employment service; Local government; Natural disaster relief; Payments in lieu of taxes and shared revenues; Federal aid to welfare; Twenty-five federal grant-in-aid programs; Administrative and fiscal impact of federal grants-in-aid; The impact of federal grants-in-aid on the structure and functions of state and local governments.
